answers.answer: May be best to get some adrenal testing done.
Diabetes can cause craving for sweets & bread, my mom is type II diabetic, and loves to eat both, it helps her diabetic symptoms.Good luck to you !!

I'm currently on Armour. My craving for sweets has dropped big time from when I was in my 20s. Now, I can walk around shopping for something like cookies but then pass over most of it because of too much sugar.  Then I'll buy dried banana chips or Oreo cookies but the cookies will usually last a while and I find myself often removing the filling because of the sugar. Weird!

While diabeties can run hand in hand with thyroid problems, it would be good to test out the adrenals too. If you crave salt and sugar together that can be a problem with the adrenals.Insulin resistance is a biggy with underactive thyroid function too.

Thanks for the input.  The frustrating part is that I've been tested for adrenals, diabets, and a million other things and they are all normal. . Even my numerous thyroid tests come back normal.  However, I have all the other signs and symptoms of having a thyroid or adrenal problemMy doc put me on Armour for three weeks to see how I respond. Overall I feel like I have more energy, am a little more alert (less foggy thinking), and have more of my old fun personality back. The only "side effecct"i s more sweets. Ugh!

question: I was recently put on Armour and vitamin D. Since then I've had a big craving for sweets and bready foods.  What is causing this craving?
